actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize and hold an international conference in the United States in fiscal year 1978 and authorize an appropriation therefor.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to organize an international conference on heart disease, cancer, and stroke to be held in Washington, D.C. during fiscal year 1978. Authorizes the appropriation of $5,000,000 to carry out this resolution.

titles.title: Joint resolution to enable the United States to organize and hold an international conference in the United States in fiscal year 1978 and authorize an appropriation therefor.
